page.title: 08Home Life
page.content:
cont. quiet and peaceful and there are some lovely houses,the animals and countryside are beautiful.The people who move are the ones who prefer the noise and bustle of the town.
{A Day In The Life {of my Dad My Dad is a{Farmer.}I have heard many people say;"Oh marry a farmer,they are very rich!".But they don't realise that it is hard work. Here is a timetable of his average days work:{ {8a.m.}He gets up and has his breakfast {8.40am.}He goes around and feeds all the animals in turn,around the farm buildings. {9.40am.}He then feeds the animals out in the fields.
